longBusinessSummary: Nippon Light Metal Holdings Company, Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum products in Japan and internationally. It operates through four segments: Aluminum Ingot and Chemicals; Aluminum Sheet and Extrusions; Fabricated Products and Others; and Aluminum Foil, Powder and Paste. The Aluminum Ingot and Chemicals segment provides aluminum, aluminum hydroxide, chemical products, caustic soda, chlorinated chemical products, aluminum ingots, and aluminum alloys that are used as raw materials for flame retardants, ceramics, and other products, as well as industrial materials in paper and pulp manufacturing. The Aluminum Sheet and Extrusions segment offers automobile suspension parts, lead-free cut aluminum alloys, quick freezing coagulated powder extruded materials, and high-intensity molded aluminum sheets; structural materials for railway rolling stocks and flaps for trucks; and thick plates for semiconductor and LCD manufacturing equipment, foil stocks, and photosensitive drum materials. This segment also provides printing rolls and industrial materials; and aluminum honeycomb panels, scaffolding products, and building materials. The Fabricated Products and Others segment provides cast and forged parts, heat exchangers, van truck bodies and trailers, anodized foil for electrolytic capacitors, clean rooms, landscape engineering products, solid truss structural materials, plant packages for communication base stations, and panels for commercial refrigerators and freezers. The Aluminum Foil, Powder and Paste segment offers various aluminum foils, powders and pastes, and back sheets and electrode inks for solar cells. The company's products are used in automobile, electrical and electronics, information and telecommunication, safety, energy, construction, railroad, industrial, building and infrastructure materials, food and lifestyle, and environmental or energy applications. Nippon Light Metal Holdings Company, Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
shortName: NIPPON LIGHT METAL HLDGS CO LIM
longName: Nippon Light Metal Holdings Company, Ltd.
